# invalidateLayout(of:)

**Instance Method**

Invalidates the layout of a layer so it knows to refresh its content on the next frame.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func invalidateLayout(of layer: CALayer)
```

## Managing Layout

- **layoutSublayers(of:)**: Override to customize layout of sublayers whenever the layer needs redrawing.
- **preferredSize(of:)**: Override to customize layer size.
